duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist customers and complete marketing activities under the guidance of an Agent or Lead Sales Agent.
Responsible for marketing and servicing Direct Auto products including Auto, Life, Auto Club, and Roadside Assistance to new and existing customers.
Monitor key competitors in the local market area and make suggestions to improve the company's position in the marketplace.
Responsible for sales administration and reporting activities.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, Property/Casualty license preferred but not required. Ability to acquire Property/Casualty license as part of training program within 90 days of hire.
